class.name: wxToolbook
class.description:
wxToolbook is a class similar to wxNotebook but which uses a wxToolBar to show the labels instead of the tabs.

There is no documentation for this class yet but its usage is identical to wxNotebook (except for the features clearly related to tabs only), so please refer to that class documentation for now. You can also use the Notebook Sample to see wxToolbook in action.

flag.name: wxTBK_BUTTONBAR
flag.description: Use wxButtonToolBar-based implementation under Mac OS (ignored under other platforms).

flag.name: wxTBK_HORZ_LAYOUT
flag.description: Shows the text and the icons alongside, not vertically stacked (only implement under Windows and GTK 2 platforms as it relies on wxTB_HORZ_LAYOUT flag support).

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_TOOLBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
type.description: The page selection is about to be changed. This event can be vetoed (using wxNotifyEvent::Veto()).

bitmap.label: Bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap shown alongside the label (default: none).

int.name: image
int.label: Image index
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item into the image list.

bool.name: selected
bool.label: Selected
bool.description: Is the page selected initially (only one page can be selected; default: 0)?
